about_the_game:
The Mirst is a horror game, you will be unleashed in front of your house where bizarre events are going to happen to you to find the origin of it all.

The Mirst is an original indie Horror game inspired by the real and past facts of the game's creator. Relive one of the stories in this first-person game, analyze every detail of this house that's what's hidden there. You will be cowardly in this house at your own risk, to seek and find the origin of the various events in this house.

Every element and object can be inspected, doors to open with keys to hide or paintings to move, concentrate or flee this house.

Inspectable Item

Each Object of this house will be possible to look at them more closely which is what this house hides as a secret .....

Paranormal Event

Live a new paranormal experience, which is what awaits you in this house. Don't worry, it's everywhere .....

Solo

No need for a friend to help you in this solo adventure live alone as the character in the game

Story

Live a Story inspired by real feelings, live the story as the character will have lived it

Immersion

A particular point has been put on the design of a simple and sober interface with realistic graphics and 3D Audios in order to offer you a better immersion.

OMG STUDIO 2021

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570 4GB VRAM / GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050TI 8GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
